character.statement: Help us get these Rock Trolls outta here.
Hooray! I like it. Let's get ready to jam!
I'm going to destroy all music except for rock!
These Rock Trolls are blasting us with heavy metal rock ballads and extremely long guitar solos.
It's going to be ok, Mr. Dinkles.
No worries! I can defeat them with my epic electric guitar skills.
